statements: SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, category, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 50 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 10 ORDER BY category, product_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE category='Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC, product_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT product_name, category, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC, product_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category='Clothing' AND stock_quantity < 50 ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC, product_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM products p JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT product_name, AVG(price) as avg_price FROM products GROUP BY product_name HAVING AVG(price) > 30;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM products JOIN categories ON products.category_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT category_name, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM products JOIN categories ON products.category_id = categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products, category_name FROM products JOIN categories ON products.category_id = categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics'
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC

SELECT product_name, category_name, price FROM products JOIN product_category ON products.product_id = product_category.product_id JOIN categories ON product_category.category_id = categories.category_id
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC, category ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY price DESC

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.category, p.price, c.category_name FROM products p JOIN product_category pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.category_id WHERE p.category = 'Toys' AND c.category_name = 'Kids' ORDER BY p.price ASC, c.category_name DESC

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.price, c.category_name FROM products p LEFT JOIN product_category pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id LEFT JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.category_name IS NULL ORDER BY p.price DESC

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.price, c.category_name FROM products p JOIN product_category pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id LEFT JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.category_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY c.category_name ASC, p.product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT name, description FROM categories ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_id, rating, review FROM product_reviews WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM categories;
SELECT name, description FROM categories;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customers.name, products.name FROM customers JOIN products ON customers.id = products.category_id;
SELECT products.name, AVG(product_reviews.rating) AS avg_rating FROM products JOIN product_reviews ON products.id = product_reviews.product_id GROUP BY products.name;
SELECT * FROM Categories;
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM Categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Attributes WHERE attribute_name LIKE '%color%';
SELECT review_text, rating, review_date FROM Reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE product_price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM Products INNER JOIN Categories ON Products.category_id = Categories.category_id;
SELECT attribute_name, attribute_description FROM Attributes WHERE attribute_name LIKE '%color%';
SELECT product_name, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM Products INNER JOIN Reviews ON Products.product_id = Reviews.product_id GROUP BY product_name HAVING AVG(rating) > 3;
